page.title: 13REGIS CENTRE-SW.BOGNOR REGIS
page.content: The{Regis Centre,}the entertainment centre for this area,was opened in 1980.It has a wide range of activities and facilities for people of all ages. It has a{theatre/cinema}which seats nearly 400 people, a{hall}which can be used for exhibitions,conferences and dinner dances, a{club room,}a{bar,}a {cafeteria}and a{covered concourse. Stage shows,films ,plays and musicals are held in the Alexandra Theatre and wrestling,dances,discos and exhibitions in the Royal Hall.The centre is also used for a{variety of {clubs}such as Keep Fit and Jazz music.There is also the{Fun Club}which is held for children every Saturday morning. One of the more unusual events is the game of giant chess which is held outside on the patio.The patio is often used for one day markets or craft exhibitions.
